Text.content:
Notes and ideas about how to improve the content of this page will be added in this box. Such can be:

  • Do not contantly address the reader using "we" like "we explain" or "we describe".
    • Instead use terms like "this article explains".
    • Sometimes using "we" is ok, but do not overuse this.
  • Do not write headlines as questions like "What are permissions".
    • Instead use headlines like "Permissions explained".

To check the legacy page version, a link to the online documentation is to be included in this content.
